text:
March 16, 1950
Hr. Dick Hull
Radio Station bo I
Iowa State College
Ames, Iowa
Dear Dicks
Harry’s idea sounds good to me. I vote a hearty "aye"
to his suggestion.
You will be interested to hear that UC/'-FM was voted
membership in the Alabama Broadcasters Association this past
week-end at the annual Spring meeting of that group. Further¬
more, I was elected Secretary-Treasurer of the organization.
This latter deal means a lot of extra work for me, but it is
very gratifying in that we have worked a long time toward the
establishment of the state headquarters on our campus and this
can be the beginning of the realization of those plans. That
is not for publication, however.
x My best to you always. Guess I’ll be seeing you at the
Columbus meeting.
Sincerely,
Omydon AusttaS, Mrector
Radio Broadcasting Service®
Manager, TdOA-FM *
GA/ns
